title: DL Size brochure quick turn around needed - images supplied :-)
snippet:
I need a DL sized brochure for an upcoming show that my coffee cart company is exhibiting at a trade show.

The purpose of the brochure is to entice the delegates to come to our  tradestand, drop their business card into a draw, and grab a free coffee. By dropping their business card in to us they will go in the draw to win a barista in their office for a morning tea.

This one pager will be placed inside of a trade show show bag given to delegates (they are all executive assistants).

Top Left:
Logo

Font:
Open Sans

Background:
Image supplied

Body Copy:
Melbourne-quality coffee for events, catering for between 20 to 20 000 people—perfect for conferences, tradeshows, corporate events, activations and more. 

Call to action:
Contact us today about your next event

Contact details:
www.coffeeoncue.com.au 03 9038 9171

I have an array of images that I can share that are professionally shot as well as our logo in eps format please let me know what else you will need. Also see our website for a in depth look at what we do.
